title: [NDS] 2809 - Castlevania Order of Ecclesia (U)(VENOM)
description:
Happy Global Anti-Piracy Day! lol.

... there was the usual bullshit rumbling about this release being corrupt and bricking R4/M3/Cyclo adapters. However, this has been DISPROVEN. This version (i.e. the VENOM release, of which there are other torrents also) is CONFIRMED TO WORK on R4DS, and (according to comments below) equivalent cards.

Besides this, it's quite a good game. Perhaps even worth buying, for like 10 euros or something.
